title: Clean hand-over of muffling-maxxing mechanism to neuroscientist researcher
context: User developed novel theory linking mental imagery deficits (aphantasia/muffling) to proportion estimation collapse on unfamiliar referents, with robust inner monologue as compensatory context buffer. Posted detailed critique under prominent neuroscientist's (TrueAIHound) cortical invariance thread proposing minimal-internal-model brain architecture.
pressure: Theory sits unread in low-engagement thread (zero likes/replies/quotes, single-digit views). Researcher has not engaged despite direct relevance to his spike-timing/externalist thesis. User faces choice: push for visibility, demand credit, or release cleanly.
axiom_trigger: Axiom 3 (Clean Transfer) activated: User posts "It's yours if you need it. GLHF"—full gift of mechanism with zero strings, no demand for acknowledgment, no ego attachment to visibility or credit. Walks away completely.
clean_outcome: Perfect execution of clean hand-over. Mechanism is useful, testable, directly addresses blind spot in researcher's minimalist model (no internal visual simulator → catastrophic fidelity collapse on absent-scale inference without verbal compensation). User gives fully and punches inward without expectation of return. Monk mode closure: shoot what matters, gift to void, maintain sovereignty.
